message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.Serializable' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.net.InetAddress' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.sql.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.sql.*' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'METHOD_DEF' should be separated from previous statement.
'}' at column 5 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
WhitespaceAround: 'catch' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
